trans-unit.source: The `Get-DscConfigurationStatus` cmdlet gets information about configuration status from a target node.
trans-unit.target: The `Get-DscConfigurationStatus` cmdlet gets information about configuration status from a target node.

trans-unit.source: A rich object is returned that includes high-level information about whether or not the configuration run was successful or not.
trans-unit.target: A rich object is returned that includes high-level information about whether or not the configuration run was successful or not.

trans-unit.source: You can dig into the object to discover details about the configuration run such as:
trans-unit.target: You can dig into the object to discover details about the configuration run such as:

trans-unit.source: All of the resources that failed
trans-unit.target: All of the resources that failed

trans-unit.source: Any resource that requested a reboot
trans-unit.target: Any resource that requested a reboot

trans-unit.source: Meta-Configuration settings at time of configuration run
trans-unit.target: Meta-Configuration settings at time of configuration run

trans-unit.source: The following parameter set returns the status information for the last configuration run:
trans-unit.target: The following parameter set returns the status information for the last configuration run:

trans-unit.source: The following parameter set returns the status information for all previous configuration runs:
trans-unit.target: The following parameter set returns the status information for all previous configuration runs:
